title: Grillhaxe (Grilled Eisbein, Pork Shanks) Recipe
description: Marjoram, basil, rosemary, thyme, and a big splash of olive oil make a savory rub for tender, slow-roasted pork shanks.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines European German Grillhaxe (Grilled Eisbein, Pork Shanks) 4.9 (10) 8 Reviews 2 Photos Succulent pork shanks with irresistible crackling, spiced and oven-roasted for three hours and served with sauerkraut and mashed potatoes. Mmmmm. Submitted by Kevin Edwards Updated on July 11, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 3 hrs Total Time: 3 hrs 10 mins Servings: 12 Yield: 12 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 1 cup olive oil 2 tablespoons dried marjoram 2 tablespoons dried basil 2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary 2 tablespoons sea salt 1 teaspoon paprika 1 teaspoon ground black pepper 1 teaspoon vegetable bouillon powder 6 (1 1/2) pounds pork shanks Directions Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Whisk olive oil, marjoram, basil, rosemary, thyme, sea salt, paprika, black pepper, and vegetable bouillon powder together in a bowl. Rub pork shanks with herb rub and arrange on a large baking pan. Roast in preheated oven until shanks are tender and outer skin is crispy, about 3 hours. Editor's Note: The nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of the herb rub ingredients. The actual amount of the ingredients consumed will vary. name: Kevin Edwards
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).;Whisk olive oil, marjoram, basil, rosemary, thyme, sea salt, paprika, black pepper, and vegetable bouillon powder together in a bowl. Rub pork shanks with herb rub and arrange on a large baking pan.;Roast in preheated oven until shanks are tender and outer skin is crispy, about 3 hours.
